description:
Watch full episodes of your favorite CBS shows with the free CBS app for iPad and iPhone! Enjoy primetime, daytime and late night episodes from America’s most watched network. 

Catch up on full episodes of NCIS, The Big Bang Theory, CSI: Crime Scene Investigation, Survivor, Elementary, The Young and the Restless, The Late Show with David Letterman and many more. 

Use the ‘My CBS’ feature to be notified when episodes of your favorite shows have been added to the app.

Check out the Primetime Schedule to learn what’s coming up on CBS and set reminders for single episodes or special events - never miss a moment! 

CBS app includes these features: 
* Full Episode Streaming in HD 
* Personalized Show List 
* Photo Galleries and Cast Pages 
* Primetime Schedule
* Live Video Chats with CBS Stars

Download the free CBS app on your iPad and iPhone to experience all of this and more! 

Plus, CBS All Access subscribers get exclusive app features including:
* New Episodes on-demand the next day
* Live TV Streaming from select local CBS stations 
* Access to CBS library of over 6,500 episodes including every episode of every season of top shows such as Big Brother and The Good Wife.
* Ad free viewing for CBS classic shows and fan favorites such as Star Trek, I Love Lucy, CSI: Miami and more.

Show and episode availability subject to change. Please note use of the CBS app is limited to United States. Video is accessible via 3G, 4G, LTE, and WiFi networks. Data charges may apply.  Live TV subject to availability. Other restrictions apply.

Mobile Service Agreement:
